info.title: Employee-API
info.description: A REST based API that serves basic information about employees.

get.description: This method fetches a employee resource from the database based on the given employee id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the employee to look up.

404.description: Employee requested for the given id doesn't exist in the database.

200.description: The employee resource requested has been fetched successfully.

put.summary: This method updates a Employee resource with requisite details and updates it to the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the employee to update.

409.description: Employee data with same update already exists.

400.description: Employee data is invalid, e.g. primary emailAddress is missing.

200.description: The Employee resource has been updated successfully.

delete.summary: This method deletes a Employee resource from the database for the given employee id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the employee to delete.

204.description: The Employee resource has been deleted successfully.

404.description: Employee data is invalid, e.g. primary emailAddress is missing.

post.summary: This method creates a Employee resource with requisite details and adds it to the database.

201.description: The Employee resource has been created successfully.

400.description: Employee data is invalid, e.g. primary emailAddress is missing.

get.description: This method fetches a employee resource from the database based on the given employee firstName.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: The first name of the employee to look up.

404.description: Employee requested for the given firstName doesn't exist in the database.

200.description: The employee resource requested has been fetched successfully.

get.description: This method fetches a employee resource from the database based on the given employee's department name.

parameters.name: departmentName
parameters.description: The department name of the employee to look up.

200.description: The employee resource requested has been fetched successfully.

404.description: Employee requested for the given department name doesn't exist in the database.
